query:
query ($filter: JSON) {
    case (offset: 0, first: 10000, sort: [ { bmi: "asc" } ], filter: $filter) { 
      project_id
      gender
      bmi
      age_at_index
      diastolic_blood_pressure
      systolic_blood_pressure
      diabetes
      hypertension
      cerebrovascular_disease
      chronic_respiratory_disease
      coronary_artery_disease
      heart_failure
      myocardial_infarction
      stroke
      hypertension_meds
      submitter_id
    }
  }
